  • Constructor Details

    • InteractionDescription

      public InteractionDescription(double aTemperature, double aDpdSigma, boolean anIsGaussianRandomDpdForce, int aParticleTypeNumber, double[][] anAij, Electrostatics anElectrostatics, GravitationalAcceleration aGravitationalAcceleration, SimulationDescription aSimulationDescription)
      Constructor (No checks are performed)
      Parameters:
      aTemperature - Temperature in DPD units (i.e. kT fractions, k: Boltzmann constant)
      aDpdSigma - DPD sigma parameter in DPD units
      anIsGaussianRandomDpdForce - Flag for use of Gaussian random for random force
      aParticleTypeNumber - Number of particle types
      anAij - Conservative force repulsion parameters a(ij)
      anElectrostatics - Electrostatics parameters (may be null)
      aGravitationalAcceleration - Gravitational acceleration
      aSimulationDescription - Simulation description

    • isGaussianRandomDpdForce

      public boolean isGaussianRandomDpdForce()
      Flag for use of Gaussian random for random force
      Returns:
      True : Random DPD force is driven by random variable with Gaussian distribution with zero mean and unit variance (slower) False: Random DPD force is driven by random variable with uniform distribution with zero mean and unit variance (faster)
